required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 2 Study With Cis-UCA Ophthalmic Solutions in Subjects With Dry Eye
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2, Multi-Center, Randomized, Double Masked, Placebo Controlled Clinical Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of 1.0% and 2.5% Cis-UCA Ophthalmic Solutions in Subjects With Dry Eye

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the Phase 2 study is to compare the safety and efficacy of cis-UCA Ophthalmic Solutions to placebo for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of dry eye.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
